column5: I started out by reducing the size of my photos to 480 x 360 pixels, then hit the upload and the first picture went thru. then I tried to add a second picture the same size and my upload was rejected because there wasn't enough room with the 250K size limit .  How do you guys add the multiple pictures to your reports and replies that makes them sooo good!  I was thinking about using the photobucket.com album i have but i don't know what option to choose from that site either.  any help in this would be greatly appreciated.
photobucket is the way to go... once you upload you're pics use the IMG code and paste it in here.  I can walk you through this just drop me a PM if it does not work.  G

Hey there....I upload all my pics 800x600 to www.photobucket.com  It's free to sign up.  Simply click on the "IMG Code" box and then come back to the post and paste it in here...  The pic should show up in the post....   PM me if you are still having issues ok?  Cliff

photobucket.com you click on   choose files  under Upload Images & Video that opens a window with a link to you hard drive you browse till you find the photo name and left mouse click on it then click on open and it uploads it to your album  then you look at the picture and under it you see  email and IM Direct Link HTML Code IMG Code  click on IMG Code   and it will copy  the link to your clip board  then in your thread, where you want the picture you right mouse click and in the menu click paste then click add reply and you have added a picture to you post
Hopefully between the three of us, one of us explained it clearly enough....LOL
thanks for the help I think I will be able to do this now.
